title: What are some essay topics? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can choose one from the lists on Make a Stand - Education Blog. Here are some of my favorite from different thematic fields. Where you have links - there is a literature review on the topic so that you will already have the sources to use with formatted citations. Education: 1. Is homeschooling compatible with/better than traditional schooling? 2. Should students’ free speech be restricted at school/on campus? 3. Is higher education worth its value? Technology: 1. Is it possible to say that solving one human problem technology creates another? 2. Should there be legal consequences for hate speech in the Internet? 3. Are cognitive computers like Watson a good idea? 4. Is technology making people dumper or smarter? Medicine: 1. Is cost of the healthcare in the United States justified? 2. Should there be an opt-in or opt-out donor system? 3. Should TV commercials/ads of McDonald’s/fast food chains be banned? Philosophy and Ethics: 1. Are people good or evil by nature? 2. Does free will exist? Should the notion of free be reconsidered? 3. Is cloning ethically permissible? 4. Do democratic states have moral right/moral obligation to overthrow/help overthrow dictatorship/eliminate oppression in some states? State Policy: 1. Should the rich pay a higher percentage of taxes? 2. Can mass surveillance be justified? 3. Should the state interfere into the military conflicts of other states? In what way? In what cases? 4. Should the state refuse to import the products, which were manufactured/obtained at the cost of someone’s health? Popular Practices: 1. Does media violence promotes the real one? Are media regulations justified? Should they be even stricter? 2. Can Google turn into an evil empire? 3. Do companies have to be obliged to reveal the fact of outsourcing products and services? Why?

So you must be probably aware that there are different types of essays. Descriptive EssayNarrative EssayInformative EssayExpository EssayArgumentative EssayThese are so far that my English teacher had to discuss. I am good with Descriptive and Narrative because I am a journalist at our school. But the most commonly used topics for essays are these that I am going to enumerate. What is the most satisfying moment in your life?What is the saddest moment in your life?Can you recall your vacation?Of course, descriptive and narrative can be anything. It is like Feature Writing. However in Expository, Argumentative, and Informative.. commonly used topics could be: PoliticsScience-TechnologyEtcetera..
